name: Pretty In Pink And Brown Baby Blanket
description:
Pink and Chocolate Brown… what a combo!

	The back of this Cozy Blanket is made with soft, luxurious pink chenille… which makes this blanket 100% cotton. The chenille is absorbant enough that you could even use this as a beautiful, stylish baby towell… whatever you want it to be!

	All of my RowleyCozys measure about 30 by 36 inches, and they all have a convenient ribbon loop tag on them so you can link toys to them, or link it to a carseat or stroller and it won’t get lost!

	I will always ship internationally… if you need the details, let me know.

	I can also make other items to match this darling blanket. If you are in need of a pocket, burpie, changing pad, or lovey, do let me know and I can make a whole set for you!

	Introductory price – Regularly $48, on sale for $38

name: Happy Birthday to Baby Bib
Day of the Dead Baby or Toddler Bib
description:
This is a great bib – it is a super cute skulls fabric that is perfect for everyday use, or for going out and about!

	Your little stylish Baby will love it! It’s got a great Day of the Dead theme, with a black background.

	It has my signature ribbon loop tag, and you can attach toys to it, the pacifier, etc… it’s so handy. This bib is backed with super soft fabric, so it will be both stylish and useful… your baby will be the fanciest baby at the restaurant… this bib can be used from baby’s first foods, all the way through the toddler years.

	This darling bib attaches around the neck with velcro – easy on, easy off…

name: The Big Apple Burpies
description:
These are great little burpies – they are made from a stylish, absorbent flannel. They are a lovely pink with chocolate brown, red, cream, and pink apples.

	These are great for tucking under Baby’s chin while bottle feeding, or for throwing on your shoulder for a good burping session.

	Each burpie has a ribbon loop tag so you can attach it to the stroller, car seat, or high chair. You won’t lose it this way, and it won’t get dirty by being dropped on the ground! It’s worry free! Don’t you wish more things in life were like this?

	This listing is for one burpie

name: Buy Me Some Peanuts & Crackerjacks Diaper Bag Organizer & Burpie Set
description:
The RowleyPocket is designed to keep a couple of diapers and a travel packet of wipes in it, and I always throw in one of those single use tubes of formula, as well as a changing pad.

	The RowleyPocket makes changing diapers convenient – just grab the pocket instead of the entire diaper bag, and do whatcha gotta do!

	The RowleyCloth is a generously sized burp cloth, which can be used as a changing pad in a pinch. Like all of the RowleyCloths, I have included a ribbon loop so that you can use those toy plastic links to link the burp cloth to the carseat or stroller – no more dropping them or loosing them!

	The RowleyPocket is fully lined, with a velcro closure. This one is red, but I have included pics of a navy blue one as well, which you can choose if you prefer it. I have also included a picture of the coordinating RowleyCozy Blanket.
